headline.print_headline: Tobacco Giants Resist Harsh Public Admissions About Smoking
headline.main: Tobacco Giants Resist Harsh Public Admissions About Smoking

docs.lead_paragraph: Never underestimate the staying power of big tobacco.
docs.snippet: Never underestimate the staying power of big tobacco.

headline.print_headline: Reynolds American Delving Deeper Into Nicotine Gum Business
headline.main: Reynolds American Delving Deeper Into Nicotine Gum Business

docs.lead_paragraph: Cigarette maker Reynolds American Inc. is partnering with a pharmaceutical consultancy to develop products that help people stop smoking.
docs.snippet: Cigarette maker Reynolds American Inc. is partnering with a pharmaceutical consultancy to develop products that help people stop smoking.

headline.print_headline: Vape 'Em if You Got 'Em: Jails Sell e-Cigarettes to Inmates
headline.main: Vape 'Em if You Got 'Em: Jails Sell e-Cigarettes to Inmates

docs.lead_paragraph: E-cigarettes keep popping up for sale at county jails around the country even as some government officials, schools and health experts urge tighter control over the devices, especially in public buildings.
docs.snippet: E-cigarettes keep popping up for sale at county jails around the country even as some government officials, schools and health experts urge tighter control over the devices, especially in public buildings.
